collect_csv_file module¶

collect_csv_file.collect_csv_file(path)¶

Function that collects all the .csv filenames in the data folder.

Parameters:

path – Input that is a string for a directory path
Returns:

list(str) of all .csv filenames
Raises:
  • ImportError – error raised if import module not found
  • TypeError – error raised if there are no *.csv files
  • ValueError – error raised if final list has non-string type
